scripts.pm2:bench: yarn pm2:start && autocannon localhost:4000 && yarn pm2:stop
scripts.start:heapdump: yarn build && PORT=4000 NODE_ENV=production HEAPDUMP=true node --expose-gc lib/index.js
scripts.perf:flamegraph: yarn build && rimraf '*.0x' && NODE_ENV=production 0x -P 'yarn autocannon localhost:4000' --open -- node lib/index.js
